channel.title: podcast on Mya Pitzeruse
channel.description: Recent content in podcast on Mya Pitzeruse

item.title: For the love of programming
item.description: Join me on the WomenInTech show. In this episode, Espree and I discuss my journey into tech. From my early days working on things in high school to the work I do today. I hope you enjoy the show!

item.title: Cloud dependencies
item.description: Join me on the Software Engineering Daily podcast. In this episode, Jeff and I discuss my personal project deps.cloud. We discuss benefits and tradeoffs to leveraging monorepos as well as challenges maintaining source control at a large organization. I hope you enjoy the show!
